replies.msg:
部電腦唔知咩事
一開所有遊戲就會畫面卡住
mouse keyboard無反應
平時唔開遊戲
畫CAD Word 上網睇片個D就無問題
試過安全模式都係咁
拎走張display 用內置display都係咁
換過D ram 卡都係咁
有無人試過/知道壞咩?

LENOVO SHARKBAY
Intel Core i7 4790 @ 3.60GHz
16.0GB Dual-Channel DDR3 @ 798MHz (11-11-11-28)
2048MB ATI AMD Radeon HD 8570 Graphics
238GB SAMSUNG MZ7LN256HCHP-000 SCSI Disk Device (SSD)
931GB Seagate ST1000DM 003-1ER162 SCSI Disk Device (SATA)
MATSHITA DVD-RAM SW840 SCSI CdRom Device
